VoiceList.Entry: Tifa “Cloud!?”
Doctor “Hey! You barged in here like Meteor was crashing down or something.”
Tifa “I'm sorry…but I heard a friend of mine was here…”
Doctor “A friend?”
Doctor “Oh…that young fellow!?”
“Don't worry. He's next door. But his condition isn't good.”
Tifa “Here?”
Tifa “Over here.”
Tifa “Cloud!?”
Tifa “Oh…Cloud!! I'm so glad you're safe!?”
Tifa “…!?”
Tifa “Cloud?”
Cloud “Uh…aaa…?”
Tifa “Wh…what's wrong… Cloud?”
Cloud “Aaa..gurk..”
Tifa “Cloud! What happened to you?”
Doctor “Mako poisoning… Quite an advanced case.”
“It appears this young man's been exposed to high levels of Mako energy for an extended period of time.”
“He probably has no idea who or where he is now…”
“Poor fellow, he can't even speak. He's literally miles away from us.”
“Some place far away where no one's ever been… All alone…”
Tifa “Doctor!!”
Barret “This's bad…”
Red XIII “How horrible…”
Cait Sith “That's terrible…”
Cid “Damn,that's evil.”
Yuffie “You lyin' or what!?”
Vincent “…”
Tifa “Cloud…”
Doctor “Ahem! Let's excuse ourselves.”
Doctor “Listen,would you all mind… waiting outside?”
Barret “…”
Tifa “Why? What do you want me to do?”
Tifa “Please,Cloud… Talk to me…”
“Tell me you see me, that you can hear me… Tell me,please…”
Tifa “I made it this far believing in the memories we shared.”
“This isn't happening! It's too cruel!”
Tifa “Oh,Cloud! I…”
Tifa “I don't care about anything else, only Cloud…”
Tifa “I…want to be by his side…”
Barret “Yeah,that's probably best…”
“For Cloud… and you…”
Red XIII “Yes,that's best!”
Cid “Yeah. Right. Hang in there,Tifa.”
Yuffie “Then you gotta do it. You gotta be true to yourself.”
Cait Sith “If Tifa were my nurse, I'd switch places with Cloudany day!
Vincent “Do what you wish.”
Tifa “I'm sorry,everyone… Especially now…”
Barret “Why you apologizin'? We'll come back again an' check on ya.”
Barret “You take care now,Tifa. And take care of Cloud.”
Cid “Don't worry. I'll stop by again.”
Cid “You hang in there,Tifa. Take care of Cloud.”
Red XIII “That's all right. We'll be by again.”
Red XIII “Do your best,Tifa. Take care of Cloud.”
Yuffie “No big,no big. I'll pop in again later.”
Yuffie “Look after Cloud. Take care,Tifa.”
Cait Sith “What're you talkin' about? We'll stop in again.”
Cait Sith “Hope Cloud gets better soon.”
Vincent “Don't worry. We'll return and check on him later.”
Vincent “Take care of him.”
Tifa “Right…”
Barret “Oh,and uh,Tifa… I don't like askin' this but…”
“Are you sure he's really your friend? And not Sephiroth's shadow?”
Tifa “Huh!? Well…that is…”
Tifa “No,I'm sure of it!”
Barret “Yeah? OK,then… Sorry for askin'.”
Barret “We gotta get back to the Highwind.”
Cid “Now,we gotta be headin' back to the Highwind.”
Red XIII “We should be getting back to the Highwind.”
Yuffie “Hey,shouldn't we be gettin' back to the Highwind?”
Cait Sith “Well,I guess we'd better go back to the Highwind.”
Vincent “Very well then,we should return to the Highwind.”
“She's always there right by his side. She must really love him.”
“Even at a time like this you should never give up hope. You've got to be strong like her.”
“Sometimes he mumbles about numbers… I wonder what it means?”
“She's finally beginning to look a little tired… I hope she's all right.”
“No change in his condition, yet she stays right by his side. It must be tough on her.”
“If she keeps this up she's going to get sick…”
Doctor “I'm sorry… But your friend's condition remains unchanged…”
“You'll have to be patient and wait this out. These things take time. Just like fine wine,time is of the essence.”
Cloud “A billion mirror fragments… small…light…”
“taken…angel's… singing voices… …Xeno…gears…”
Cloud “uh…a….aah…”
“…what… What number….am I?”
Tifa “Cloud… I don't understand a word.”
“I'm such a fool…… I thought I could do something to help…”
Tifa “…It's no use…I don't understand a thing,Cloud.”
“What should I do? What if you never recover for the rest of your life?”
Tifa “Eyaaah!?”
Tifa “Oh no… It's…”
Cloud “…coming…. They're…coming…!!”
Cid “What did you say,Cloud!?”
Cid “Damn. What the hell's goin' on!?”
Doctor “This is bad!! This one's big!”
“Eyaaah! I hate earthquakes!!”
Tifa “Oh god… The tremors are getting worse.”
Tifa “Wait a minute,Cloud.”
Tifa “Doctor! Shouldn't we move him somewhere?”
Doctor “Hmm…It might be safer to move to an open area.”
Tifa “Don't you worry about a thing,Cloud…”
“I'll see to it that you get somewhere safe!”
Doctor “No! The structure can't take it!! * Hurry!”
Tifa “Yes!”
Tifa “Ready Cloud? We're leaving now!!”
“Well anyhow… Hey,you all look terrible. Why don't you get some rest?”
“OK! Perfect! Well then,take care.”
